headline: Retired from US Dept of Homeland Security, Immigration & Customs Enforcement
summary: Retired law enforcement and homeland security professional with over 30 years of dedicated public service and senior management experience.  An established record of success and innovation in diverse management arenas; proven skills in fostering a corporate culture built on integrity, achieving positive results, and building successful teams within and outside of government.
